text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright
Dancing in the night
Feel the cool breeze
Swaying through the trees

[Verse 2]
City lights below
With a gentle glow
Hearts beating fast
Hoping this will last

[Chorus]
Under the moon we sing
Feel the magic it brings
Hold my hand and fly
Together you and I

[Verse 3]
Whispers in the dark
Sparks of love embark
Wish on a star
Dreams take us far

[Bridge]
Night turns into dawn
But our love goes on
Through the highs and lows
Our connection grows

[Verse 4]
Laughter fills the air
Moments that we share
Locked in memory
Just you and me
title: Under the Moon
